title: Exercise Physiology
description: Physiology of human movement with emphasis on metabolic, cardiorespiratory, and musculoskeletal aspects; associated topics include body composition, thermoregulation, and ergogenic aids.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: APPH 3755 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 3755 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 3755 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 3100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
